name: FLO:WAR
description:
• Project done over the course of my game developer training (Interface 3)

My first game made solely with Python, with the help of my teachers :)

PS: A more in-depth description of the game as well as the tools I used to make it can be found on the game's own little promotional website!

PPS: I'm aware the game crashes sometimes at the Game Over page. I've already guessed the reason for the crash but haven't found the time yet to re-do the executable yet..... If this PPS is still here in a year, you are officially allowed to smack me extremely hard on the head for forgetting to correct it.
